title: Terrible and Evil (7R50)
text:
Set:	The Return of the King
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Event â€¢ Maneuver
Game Text:	Spell. Exert Gandalf X times to wound a minion X times. If that minion is a Nazgul, wound it again.
Rarity:	R
Notes:	If Gandalf is exhausted, he cannot exert to pay the cost of this card, even if X is equal to zero.
